properties.title: EATS
properties.description:
Hungry? This is where you can find food and drinks throughout the event:

Day 1
Breakfast: Concession stands around the Amphitheatre
Lunch: Concession stands around the Amphitheatre
After Hours: EATS Market

Day 2
Breakfast: Concession stands around the Amphitheatre
Lunch: EATS Market
Concert: Concession stands around the Amphitheatre

Day 3
Breakfast: Concession stands around the Amphitheatre
Lunch: EATS Market

Snacks and water will be available throughout the venue at all times. Check the event agenda for exact meal schedules.

Dietary restrictions
All Kosher and Halal meals can be picked up across from the entrance to the Press Lounge inside the Concourse. Any other dietary needs will be listed on catering signage at each of the food stands or buffets within the venue - this includes gluten free, dairy free, vegan, and vegetarian.

properties.title: ARcade
properties.description: All the originals you could imagine with a special AR tribute to a Google classic

properties.title: Anna Ridler - Mosaic Virus
properties.label:
Anna Ridler
Mosaic Virus
properties.description: To create this piece, the artist constructed her own training set, based on thousands of pictures she took and categorized by hand. Using AI to "imagine" or "dream" tulips, the model is not just repeating flowers that are in its dataset, but creating new flowers from the knowledge that it has about the flowers it has seen.

properties.title: Onformative - Meandering River
properties.label:
Onformative
Meandering River
properties.description: Meandering River simulates the unpredictable movements of rivers and reinterprets their organic structures, rhythmic fluctuations and visual materiality. It makes changing landscapes perceivable by visualizing and sonifying a riverâ€™s impact on the surface of the earth through bespoke algorithms drawn from scientific research and satellite imagery.

properties.title: After Glow
properties.description: Imaginative and exciting performance space that blends cirque nouveau and technology. Featuring the talents of Quixotic.

properties.title: Boardwalk
properties.description: To experience the community and culture of I/O, take a stroll down the Boardwalk to check out I/O's own broadcast studio, lightning sessions, and our new I/O Arts program.

properties.title: SP a T i AL
properties.description: A multi-dimensional sound and performance environment, featuring artists working in creative coding and new technologies in the world of A.I. & M.L.

properties.title: The Rink
properties.description: Skate back to the 70's in I/O's own roller disco. Show us your moves and we will provide the grooves.

properties.title: Fungineers
properties.description: The Fungineers are a super-surreal performance group, freestyling, improvising, and serving up ice cream.

properties.title: Wi-Fries
properties.description: Grab a bite and get down at the Eats and Beats stage. Techno with a side of tacos all night long with DJ Jaj!

properties.title: Landmark Stage
properties.description: See the I/O Landmark come to life in AR. Celebrate by sharing your photos with #io19. Evening performances by NVO and East Bay Brass Band
